The set of 46 questions (see Annex 5) – seeking both individual and multiple-choice answers – was developed, 
pilot tested and revised during February 2014. In the online questionnaire, each question had to be answered 
consecutively and all were available in English or Russian, to facilitate better completion in all Member States in
